definition: definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: Of course syncopation and blues are only part of the jazz picture.
sentences.chinese: 當然，切分音和藍調只是爵士的一部分。

sentences.english: The song has a syncopated rhythm in the jazz version.
sentences.chinese: 這首歌曲改編爲爵士樂後接納了切分音節拍。

definition: dieresis/umlaut/diacritical mark separating two adjacent syllables
sonata form (one of the large-scale structures used in Western classical music)
